title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure and components of the UrbanMobilityOptimizer system.

title: Integrate Multimodal Transportation Modes
description: Identify and integrate various transportation modes (public transit, rideshare, biking, walking) into the system.

title: Develop Congestion Reduction Algorithms
description: Create algorithms to optimize traffic flow and reduce congestion in urban areas.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the UrbanMobilityOptimizer system.

title: Establish Database Schema
description: Design and set up the database schema for the UrbanMobilityOptimizer system.

title: Implement DevOps Strategy
description: Establish the development, deployment, and maintenance processes for the UrbanMobilityOptimizer system.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Test the UrbanMobilityOptimizer system to ensure its functionality and reliability.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create documentation for the UrbanMobilityOptimizer system, including setup instructions and usage guides.
